entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 11 February 2023
